item.title: 卡扎克称通胀问题几近解决，欧洲央行将降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克认为，欧洲中央银行应继续削减借贷成本，因为消费者价格增长几乎受到控制。【原文：The European Central Bank should continue to cut borrowing costs as consumer-price growth is nearly in check, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 对冲基金 "全有或全无 "交易在期权市场获得青睐
item.description: 从大选到央行利率变动，再到战争，各种事件都威胁着市场的动荡，投资者越来越多地寻求在赌对的情况下获得预先确定的回报。【原文：With events from elections to central-bank rate moves to wars threatening upheaval in the markets, investors are increasingly seeking a pre-determined payoff if they bet right.】

item.title: 爱尔兰现任官员将掌握权力，与全球投票趋势背道而驰
item.description: 爱尔兰的主要政党似乎逆转了全球沮丧选民推翻现任者的趋势，这在一定程度上得益于他们拥有大量现金来支持选举承诺。【原文：Ireland’s dominant political parties appear to have bucked the global trend of frustrated voters ousting incumbents, helped in part by a large pile of cash at their disposal to back election promises.】

item.title: Trafigura 贿赂案让大宗商品交易文化在瑞士接受审判
item.description: 周一，全球大宗商品贸易行业一场具有里程碑意义的审判在瑞士开庭，Trafigura 集团及其前首席运营官被指控犯有腐败罪。【原文：A landmark trial for the global commodity trading industry begins in Switzerland on Monday, as Trafigura Group and its former chief operating officer stand accused of corruption.】

item.title: 韩国监管机构反对股票投资者寻求的法律变革
item.description: 韩国最高金融监管机构反对投资者提出的修改公司法以解决韩国股市估值过低问题的建议。【原文：South Korea’s top financial regulator opposes proposed changes to corporate law sought by investors as a way to address undervaluation of the nation’s stock market.】

item.title: 卢比跌至历史新低，增长放缓后债券上涨
item.description: 在数据显示经济增长急剧放缓之后，印度卢比跌至历史新低。由于押注印度央行可能比预期更早降息，债券涨幅扩大。【原文：The Indian rupee declined to a new all-time low after data showed a sharp slowdown in the economic growth. Bonds extended gains on bets the central bank may cut interest rates sooner than anticipated.】

item.title: 路透社称 Kioxia 首次公开募股区间为每股 1,390-1,520 日元
item.description: 据路透社报道，日本内存制造商 Kioxia Holdings Corp. 已为其首次公开募股设定了一个暂定价格区间，该价格区间与之前的指示一致。【原文：Japanese memory maker Kioxia Holdings Corp. has set a tentative price range for its initial public offering that’s in line with its earlier indication, according to Reuters report.】

item.title: 中国制造业活动改善，铁矿石涨势扩大
item.description: 铁矿石连续第二天走高，原因是在中国政府采取刺激措施支撑经济之后，中国制造业活动有所扩大。【原文：Iron ore advanced for a second day as China’s manufacturing activity expanded following Beijing’s stimulus measures to shore up the economy.】

item.title: 日本建议提高养老金巨头 GPIF 的回报目标
item.description: 日本政府提议提高该国最大养老基金的投资回报目标，此举可能为该基金增加股票购买量开辟道路。【原文：The Japanese government proposed a higher investment return target for the nation’s largest pension fund, a move that may open the way for it to increase purchases of stocks.】

item.title: 新加坡对摩根大通客户债券交易的不当行为处以罚款
item.description: 新加坡对摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.因未能预防和发现其客户关系经理在客户债券交易中的不当行为，被新加坡罚款 240 万新元（180 万美元）。【原文：Singapore fined JPMorgan Chase & Co. S$2.4 million ($1.8 million) for failing to prevent and detect misconduct by its relationship managers over client bond trades.】

item.title: 增长计划受挫，资生堂跌至八年新低
item.description: 资生堂株式会社的股价跌至八年来的最低点，原因是投资者对该公司通过促进其他地区的增长来抵御中国市场下滑的计划感到失望。【原文：Shiseido Co. shares fell to their lowest in eight years after investors were underwhelmed by the company’s plan to counteract a slump in China by boosting growth elsewhere.】

item.title: 中国建筑商世茂清算案被法院驳回
item.description: 世茂集团控股有限公司（Shimao Group Holdings Ltd.）赢得了香港法院的裁决，驳回了债权人要求清算这家违约中国开发商的申请，为其完成债务重组计划赢得了更多时间。【原文：Shimao Group Holdings Ltd. won a Hong Kong court decision to dismiss a creditor petition to liquidate the defaulted Chinese developer, buying more time to complete its debt restructuring plan.】

item.title: 锌的狂野一周可能预示着供应受挤压的波动时代的到来
item.description: 锌可能会出现更剧烈的价格波动，因为金属供应链日益紧张，使买家面临供应突然变化的风险。【原文：Zinc could see more sharp price swings as growing tightness along the metal’s supply chain leaves buyers exposed to sudden changes in availability.】

item.title: 特朗普和利率风险沸腾，美元在 12 月面临险境
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的获胜让美元多头胆气大增，进入了一个历来会惩罚美元的月份。【原文：Dollar bulls emboldened by Donald Trump’s win are entering a month that has historically punished the greenback.】

item.title: 印度经济增长震荡给股市增添麻烦
item.description: 据策略师称，印度举世瞩目的经济增长出现小插曲，可能会加剧近期股市的疲软。【原文：A hiccup in India’s world-beating economic growth may exacerbate near-term weakness in stocks, according to strategists.】

item.title: 上田的言论增强了加息预期，日本收益率上升
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫表示，随着经济趋势的发展符合央行的预测，加息 "近在眼前"，日本政府债券收益率随之上升。【原文：Japan’s government bond yields rose after Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said interest rate hikes are “nearing” as economic trends develop in line with the central bank’s forecasts.】

item.title: 押注中国人民银行将放宽政策，中国 10 年期国债收益率降至历史最低点
item.description: 中国 10 年期国债收益率周一跌至 2% 的历史低点，因为交易商加大了对中国央行将进一步放松货币政策以支持疲软经济的押注。【原文：China’s 10-year government bond yield dropped to a historic low of 2% Monday, as traders ramped up wagers that the country’s central bank would ease monetary policy further to bolster a weak economy.】

item.title: 特朗普拥抱加密货币，美国比特币和以太币 ETF 流入创纪录
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）承诺让加密货币行业摆脱监管束缚，受此推动，直接投资于比特币和以太币的美国交易所交易基金正受到前所未有的追捧。【原文：US exchange-traded funds investing directly in Bitcoin and Ether are enjoying unprecedented demand, buoyed by President-elect Donald Trump’s pledge to unfetter the crypto industry from regulatory shackles.】

item.title: 韩国锌业因投票决定控制权争夺战的报道而跳涨
item.description: 据媒体报道，韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc Co.【原文：Korea Zinc Co. soared by daily limit after a media report said the board will convene a meeting Tuesday to decide whether to hold a shareholder meeting next month to vote on a new slate of directors proposed by its biggest block of shareholders.】

item.title: 中国私营工厂指数再次增长，显示稳定迹象
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，中国制造业活动连续第二个月扩张，这是在中国政府推出刺激计划支撑经济之后，中国经济企稳的又一迹象。【原文：China’s manufacturing activity expanded for a second straight month, according to a private survey, a further sign of stabilization after Beijing unleashed a stimulus package to shore up the economy.】

item.title: 特朗普的金砖国家货币警告提振美元，黄金下滑
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普警告所谓的 "金砖五国"，他将要求这些国家承诺不采取创建新货币的行动，受此打压，黄金价格有所回落。【原文：Gold eased, pressured by a rising US dollar after President-elect Donald Trump warned the so-called BRICS nations that he would require commitments that they would not move to create a new currency.】

item.title: 越南总理称政府目标是在 2025 年实现 8%的经济增长
item.description: 越南总理范明正表示，政府将力争明年的经济增长率达到 8%左右，大大高于议会制定的 2025 年目标。【原文：Vietnam’s Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh said the government will strive for economic growth of about 8% next year, significantly higher than the parliament’s goal for 2025.】

item.title: 印度债券有望在 2025 年延续涨势
item.description: 印度债券将迎来四年来最好的一年，在政策推动和国内需求回升的共同作用下，投资者有望获得更多收益。【原文：Indian bonds are set for the best year in four and investors expect more gains on a combination of policy drivers and resilient domestic demand.】

item.title: CVC支持的FineToday以市场状况为由推迟IPO
item.description: 日本个人护理用品企业 FineToday Holdings Co. 公司表示，由于市场状况不佳，该公司将推迟原定于 12 月 17 日进行的上市计划。【原文：Japanese personal-care business FineToday Holdings Co. said it will postpone its planned Dec. 17 listing, citing market conditions.】

item.title: 新西兰称在蛋鸡养殖场发现的禽流感并非 H5N1 病毒株
item.description: 在检测证实奥塔哥南部地区的一家商业蛋鸡养殖场的鸡感染了禽流感后，新西兰对该养殖场实施了严格的移动管制，但表示这并不是引起全球关注的禽流感病毒。【原文：New Zealand has placed strict movement controls on a commercial egg farm in the southern region of Otago after testing confirmed its chickens are infected with bird flu, but said it is not the strain causing concern globally.】

item.title: 新疆言论引发优衣库母公司股价 9 周来最大跌幅
item.description: Fast Retailing 的一位发言人称，在该公司董事长表示该零售商不使用新疆棉之后，该公司对中国的需求感到担忧，之后该公司股价下跌达 4.4%，创下自 9 月 30 日以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Shares of Fast Retailing declined as much as 4.4%, the most since Sept. 30, after a spokesperson said the company is concerned about Chinese demand following comments from its chairman that the retailer is not using cotton from Xinjiang.】
